name: unaesthetic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something is unaesthetic, it is not attractive or beautiful: Her lipstick left an unaesthetic smudge on the glass. He was wearing purple socks and a very unaesthetic pair of brown shoes. Opposite
aesthetic
More examplesFewer examplesMost of the experts criticized her unusual riding technique as being unaesthetic.They lived in an unaesthetic modern housing estate.There is something rather unaesthetic about the shape of this car.His artwork makes use of compost, household waste, and other apparently unaesthetic objects.
